SELECT t_shopping_cart.* FROM t_shopping_cart WHERE 1=1
AND t_shopping_cart.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shoppingCart.id},'%')
AND t_shopping_cart.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shoppingCart.userId},'%')
AND t_shopping_cart.product_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shoppingCart.productId},'%')
AND t_shopping_cart.product_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shoppingCart.productName},'%')
AND t_shopping_cart.cover LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shoppingCart.cover},'%')
AND t_shopping_cart.quantity LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shoppingCart.quantity},'%')
AND t_shopping_cart.total_price LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shoppingCart.totalPrice},'%')
AND t_shopping_cart.created_date LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shoppingCart.createdDate},'%')
AND t_shopping_cart.product_specification_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shoppingCart.productSpecificationId},'%')
AND t_shopping_cart.product_specification_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shoppingCart.productSpecificationName},'%')
AND t_shopping_cart.fare_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shoppingCart.fareId},'%')
AND t_shopping_cart.weight LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shoppingCart.weight},'%')
AND t_shopping_cart.bulk LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shoppingCart.bulk},'%')
